register.description: The Interrupt Mapping Register controls which of N virtual interrupt source outputs this channels physical interrupt sources will map onto. Offset = 0h + (j * 8h); where j = 0h to 3FFh

bitfield.description: Virtual interrupt status register number: this field specifies which of the potential virtual interrupt cause registers the event pending bit will appear in.
Virtual interrupt cause register bit number: this field specifies which of the 64 bits in the specified virtual interrupt cause register the event pending bit will appear in.
